overview:
Peter G. Carolan is a Financial Advisor and Investment Officer with Wells Fargo Advisors, LLC. He holds multiple professional designations specific to his specialties, being an ‘Accredited Asset Management Specialist’ & ‘Chartered Retirement Planning Counselor’. He is currently preparing to sit for his CFP. Peter and his partner manage roughly 300 high net worth households.

Prior to joining WFA, Peter was with Merrill Lynch’s Private Client Group in NYC. He is a New Jersey native, growing up in Summit & Mendham, going on to attend Delbarton High School. From there Peter attended Santa Clara University where he majored in Finance with a minor in Italian Studies.
